ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.Session

  • public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
    Session is a global singleton that holds a reference to the user that is currently logged in. It automatically saves and restores a user identity from file when the app is restarted.
